meanings.definition: A pattern of bands crossing each other.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful design with colorful crossbandings.
meanings.sent2: The rug had intricate crossbandings that added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer used crossbandings to create a quirky and eye-catching outfit.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight created interesting crossbandings of shadows on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The garden fence had lovely crossbandings that caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The act of applying bands that cross each other.
meanings.sent1: The careful crossbandings of tape ensured the package was secure.
meanings.sent2: Her precise crossbandings of fabric made the dress look professionally tailored.
meanings.sent3: The chef's crossbandings of pastry dough were so neat they looked like artwork.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic's crossbandings of wires were so organized, it was a pleasure to see.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter's crossbandings of wood were so skillful, they held the structure together perfectly.
